data.name: romanji
data.label: Romanji
data.title: Shows how the symbol can be written on a QWERTY keyboard

data.name: pronunciation
data.label: IPA Pronunciation
data.title: Displays an international phonetic pronunciation guide

data.name: digraphs
data.label: Digraphs 拗音
data.title: Show syllables that are composed of two symbols

data.name: transcription
data.label: Transcription 外国語の日本語表記
data.title: Show foreign transcription kanas

data.name: strokes
data.label: Show stroke order
data.title: Not available for diacritics or digraphs.

data.name: exceptions
data.label: Highlight romanji exceptions
data.title: Bolds the syllables that don't follow the regular romanjination pattern

data.name: similar
data.label: Highlight visually similar
data.title: When hovering on a syllable, other similar ones will be highlighted in red to avoid mixing them up

data.name: frequency
data.label: Visualize syllable frequency
data.title: The more common a sound in Japanese is, the darker it'll appear on the chart

data.name: handwritten
data.label: Handwritten font
data.title: Use a font that mimics handwriting instead
